request.description:
It allows you to update a group in whatsapp it is necessary that the participants are in your list if you want to add them

StartFragment

Replace this parameter `action` with:

- `add`
- `remove`
- `demote`
- `promote`
    

EndFragment

It allows you to update a group in whatsapp it is necessary that the participants are in your list if you want to add them

StartFragment

Replace this parameter `action` with:

- `add`
- `remove`
- `demote`
- `promote`
    

EndFragment

It allows you to update a group in whatsapp it is necessary that the participants are in your list if you want to add them

StartFragment

Replace this parameter `action` with:

- `add`
- `remove`
- `demote`
- `promote`
    

EndFragment

It allows you to change group settings

Replace this parameter `settings`with:

- only allow admins to send messages: `announcement`
- allow everyone to send messages: `not_announcement`
- allow everyone to modify the group's settings -- like display picture etc: `unlocked`
- only allow admins to modify the group's settings: `locked`

To get the invite code for a group

Concatenate: [https://chat.whatsapp.com/](https://chat.whatsapp.com/LpwHX9drRx2DlCzmVxCfUm)`xxxxxxxxx`
To join the group using the invitation code
To join the group using the invitation code
To change your display picture or a group's
To list of group with participants
